EmailTemplate.name: SCN Approved Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Approval for Employer Name: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Opportunity_Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.DBA_Name__c} Employer Type: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} SCN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Enrollment Review of Sold Case Notification {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Name} for {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Opportunity_Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Employer_Group_Data__c.DBA_Name__c}, {!Employer_Group_Data__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} has been completed and has been Officially Approved.
Thank you.
